venue.name: Microsoft New England Research & Development Center (NERD)

item.description:
May Lean Workshop

6:30pm -  Doors open for Networking and Pizza

7:00pm - Defining your Product MVP with Jay Decker, Founder and COO at Sproutlet.io

Join us for a hands-on workshop to help you define your Product MVP, led by Jay Decker, Founder and COO at Sproutlet.io. After a guided presentation where we'll re-affirm the value and process of customer validation and lean methods in product development, we'll break up into teams and define a product MVP!

You should attend this workshop if you have a validated hypothesis that you want to start building on, or if you want to take part in the process to see how it's done.

Sproutlet is a team of engineers that cultivate strategic partnerships to build market fitting products. Combining domain expertise with technology, Sproutlet places their energy behind ventures that they truly believe in.

Jay Decker has over 5 years experience in product development and managing distributed agile software teams. At Sproutlet he works on building strategic partnerships with startups, practicing lean methods and aligning customer development with product engineering.
item.how_to_find_us: Check in at the front desk and proceed up to the 11th floor
item.name: Lean Startup Circle Boston May Workshop
